TextBlock.Text: What can I learn from the signals in this system?
Found this signal next to a large green crystal. Was a hassle getting there, and all I got was another 4-digit code.
Signal found at a green fire. The 4-digit code it gave me didn't sound like other ones.
Thought I might try combining those two weird signals into a new 4-digit code, and it actually worked. Still completely useless to me, though.
Signal located next to an alien on a strange, shape-shifting moon. Not sure what they were doing there.
Found this signal deep underground at some sort of shrine. Gave me another 4-digit code, but this one sounded different than the others.
Signal found at a radio tower. There were some nice maps of the solar system inside, so I took one to put on the wall here.

My scans indicate this signal is in the center of the sun. Not sure how I'm supposed to reach it. I happened to catch a solar flare that carried part of the signal, but the eruption wasn't strong enough to carry the entire signal. I'll have to get things done without this one."
Found this signal on the structure oribiting the sun. Your average pilot might have trouble landing on something like that, but I'm not your average pilot.
Followed this signal into the weird vine planet. Found it at a large ship after a few close encounters.
